column6: p.r.; C.k.; cor. for formn. of aniline transients; rel. to $k(\ce{.OH + SCN^-})$.

p.r.; P.b.k. at 375 or 395 nm in soln. contg. $2 \times 10^{-4}$ mol L$^{-1}$ aniline; $pK_a = 4.6$; cor. for O$^-$ (14% present), at pH 11.1 $k_{obs} = 7.3 \times 10^9$; radical cation formed by OH$^-$ elimination has p$K_a$ of = 7.05.
